product_name: Sanuk Yoga Spree 2 Flip-Flops - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made from yoga mats, the slender and soulful Sanuk Yoga Spree 2 Flip-Flops for women will let your feet breathe. Sealed-edge footbeds are made from yoga mats. Rubber outsoles stand up to regular wear. All-synthetic construction makes the Sanuk Yoga Spree 2 Flip-Flops vegan-friendly. Closeout.
